sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.scss'], }) export class LoginComponent { user loginForm: FormGroup = new FormGroup({ email: new FormControl('', [Validators.required, Validators.email]), password: new FormControl('', [ Validators.required, Validators.minLength(8), ]), }); constructor() {} onSubmit() { } get email() { return this.loginForm.get('email') as FormControl; } get password() { return this.loginForm.get('password') as FormControl; } }
Log in
Email is required
Password is required Password must be at least 8 characters
